<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_531</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_531</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Ejercicios de trigonometría</string>
            <string language="en">Exercises on trigonometry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übungen auf Trigonometrie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exercices sur la trigonométrie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exercícios no trigonometry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esercitazioni su trigonometria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ασκήσεις trigonometry</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones la trigonometría. Es una introducción a la trigonometría en la que se estudian las razones trigonométricas de los ángulos agudos y ángulos cualesquiera. También se estudia la aplicación de estos conocimientos a la resolución de problemas relacionados con triángulos rectángulos e isósceles.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations as an introduction trigonometry. It studies the trigonometric ratios of acute angles and other types of angles. It also studies how to apply these concepts to the solution of problems with right triangles and isosceles triangles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ángulo</string>
            <string language="en">angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">trigonometría</string>
            <string language="en">trigonometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">razón trigonométrica</string>
            <string language="en">trigonometric ratio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">triángulos</string>
            <string language="en">triangles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">isósceles</string>
            <string language="en">isosceles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">rectángulos</string>
            <string language="en">right</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit, welches Simulationen 
als Einleitung Trigonometrie verwendet. Es studiert die 
trigonometrischen Verhältnisse von spitzen Winkeln und andere Typen 
Winkel. Es studiert auch, wie man diese Konzepte an der Lösung 
von Problemen mit rechten Dreiecken und isosceles Dreiecken anwendet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement ce qui utilise des 
simulations comme trigonométrie d'introduction. Il étudie les 
taux trigonométriques des angles aigus et d'autres types d'angles. 
Il étudie également comment s'appliquer ces concepts à la 
solution des problèmes avec de bonnes triangles et triangles 
isocèles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando qual usa simulações como um 
trigonometry da introdução. Estuda as relações trigonometric
de ângulos agudos e outros tipos de ângulos. Estuda também 
como aplicar estes conceitos à solução dos problemas com 
triângulos direitos e triângulos isosceles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quale usa le simulazioni come
trigonometria dell'introduzione. Studia i rapporti 
trigonometrici degli angoli acuti ed altri tipi di angoli. 
Egualmente studia come applicare questi concetti alla soluzione 
dei problemi con i giusti triangoli ed i triangoli isosceles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
ως trigonometry εισαγωγής. Μελετά τις trigonometric 
αναλογίες των οξειών γωνιών και άλλους τύπους γωνιών. 
Μελετά επίσης πώς να εφαρμόσει αυτές τις έννοιες στη λύση
των προβλημάτων με τα σωστά τρίγωνα και τα ισοσκελή τρίγωνα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Winkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trigonometrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">trigonometrisches Verhältnis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dreiecke</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
